thread.title: Robots and the Cloud Will Steal Jobs From Thais, Kazakhs
thread.title_full: Robots and the Cloud Will Steal Jobs From Thais, Kazakhs

author: From bloomberg.com
title: Robots and the Cloud Will Steal Jobs From Thais, Kazakhs
text: From bloomberg.com Here's the latest challenge facing Asia's slowing economies: technology. Robots, 3D printers and cloud networks will steal jobs in Asia with workers in Thailand and Kazakhstan facing the highest risk, according to a new study. About 28 percent of regular wage jobs in Kazakhstan, 26 percent in Thailand, 21 percent in Indonesia and Pakistan, and 20 percent in the Philippines are at high risk of disappearing as technology displaces workers, the Asian Development Bank said in a report Tuesday. Including temporary wage and informal self-employment, the estimates would be two to three times higher.Here's the latest challenge facing Asia's ... (
